metadata.title: CVE-2019-10212 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in, all under 2.0.20, in the Undertow DEBUG log for io.undertow.request.security. If enabled, an attacker could abuse this flaw to obtain the user's credentials from the log files.

criterions.comment: undertow package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.27-1').
